attributes.action: ensure that all carers, regardless of age, be paid a non-means tested allowance in line with the minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all carers, regardless of age, be paid a carers allowance, as a non-means tested benefit, in line with the minimum wage once caring has reached 16 hours per week and up to 45 hours per week. That carers under the age of 18 be paid at the same rate as adult carers, but that 80 per cent of this payment be placed in an interest earning account to be available to them on their 18th birthday.
